Infuse simple style into your weekday wardrobe by bringing home this pair of Gloriee Loafers which is exclusively designed by Steve Madden. Crafted in red with elastic gusset at the front these loafers ensure casual comfort to your foot. Featuring panel and stitch detailing for a fine finish these loafers are perfect to be teamed with a polo top and jeans. 

With an innate sense of what’s hot what’s next and what’s exciting the iconic brand Steve Madden known for its unique creative designs for over two decades epitomises a lifestyle by inspiring men and women to express their personality with confidence.

Clean them with a dry cloth.
